title: Introduction to Cold Calling
description: Master the fundamentals of cold calling, from mindset to preparation.

lessons.title: The Cold Calling Mindset
lessons.content: Cold calling success starts with the right mindset. In this lesson, you'll learn how to overcome call reluctance and approach each call with confidence.
objectives: Understand why cold calling remains effective
Develop a growth mindset for sales
Learn techniques to overcome call anxiety
keyPoints: Each call is practice, regardless of outcome

exercises.title: Call Reluctance Self-Assessment
exercises.instructions: Rate your comfort level with cold calling on a scale of 1-10 and identify your top 3 concerns.

lessons.title: Pre-Call Research
lessons.content: Effective cold calls start before you dial. Learn how to research prospects and personalize your approach.
objectives: Identify key information to gather before calling
Use LinkedIn and company websites effectively
keyPoints: 5 minutes of research can save 50 failed calls
Find trigger events and pain points

exercises.title: Research a Real Prospect
exercises.instructions: Choose a company in your target market and spend 5 minutes gathering key information. Document what you find.

lessons.title: Setting Up for Success
lessons.content: Your environment and tools matter. Learn how to create an optimal calling setup.
objectives: Set up an effective calling environment
keyPoints: Have your script and notes easily accessible
Stand up to project more energy

exercises.title: Create Your Calling Station
exercises.instructions: Set up your ideal calling environment and take a photo of your setup.

scenarios.title: First Call Jitters
scenarios.description: Practice making your first cold call of the day to a friendly gatekeeper.
scenarios.personaHint: Use the friendly-manager persona for a supportive first interaction.
